title: Alina Habba is 5th ex-Trump defense lawyer picked for administration
shortDescription: Alina Habba is the latest in a series of former defense lawyers to President-elect Trump who have been selected for the new administration.

title: Takeaways from Trump’s 'Meet the Press' interview
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump's interview with NBC's 'Meet the Press' aired on Sunday. Key takeaways involved immigration, tariffs and pardons.

title: The world won't wait: Trump moves in, from Syria to Ukraine
shortDescription: Joe Biden is still president, but the world's leaders and its crises are knocking on Donald Trump's door. The contrast from last time is striking.

title: What is birthright citizenship? Explaining Trump's desired changes
shortDescription: On 'Meet the Press,' Donald Trump again promised to use executive action to change birthright citizenship. What does that mean?

title: Prince William and Trump meet in Paris following Notre-Dame reopening
shortDescription: The Prince of Wales met with US President-elect Donald Trump while visiting France for the ceremonial reopening of the Notre-Dame cathedral.

title: Lara Trump steps down as RNC co-chair, would '100% consider' Senate seat
shortDescription: Lara Trump, President-elect Trump's daughter-in-law, announced she will step down as the RNC co-chair.

title: Donald Trump wants to end birthright citizenship in the US
shortDescription: Donald Trump’s team is preparing an executive order to limit birthright citizenship, aimed at restricting automatic citizenship for those born in the US.

title: How diverse is Trump's proposed cabinet?
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump's picks for his cabinet include some historic firsts: Senator Marco Rubio would be the first person of Hispanic origin to hold the role of Secretary of State.

title: Trump features Jill Biden in his fragrance ad: 'Enemies can’t resist'
shortDescription: The duo’s smiling visages stood in stark contrast to the months of acrimony and bitter takedowns on the campaign trail.

title: Trump says his lawyer Alina Habba will serve as presidential counselor
shortDescription: Alina Habba is a managing partner of a law firm based in Bedminster, New Jersey, where Trump’s golf club is located.

title: Trump says he 'can't guarantee' tariffs won't raise prices: Top takeaways
shortDescription: Trump discusses tariffs, abortion pill access, mass deportation plans and more in sweeping 'Meet the Press' interview.

title: Trump says he'll begin pardoning Jan. 6 rioters on 'first day' of second term
shortDescription: Trump gave new details on plans to start pardoning Jan. 6 rioters on his first day in office

title: Trump calls for 'immediate' ceasefire in devastating Russia-Ukraine war
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump called for an immediate Ukraine cease-fire after Syria president ousted. Russia and Ukraine name conditions.

title: ‘Bipartisanship is not dead’: Where Democrats, Trump might agree
shortDescription: Looking for a seat at the table amid a red trifecta, Democrats are signaling support for certain Trump picks and initiatives.

title: Trump’s rhetoric has already impacted these college students
shortDescription: Colleges and independent counselors are cautioning foreign students and students from mixed-status families as Trump prepares to regain power.

title: Macron hosts Trump, Musk at Notre-Dame ceremony in Paris
shortDescription: Joined by French President Macron, President-elect Donald Trump brings Elon Musk to Notre-Dame's reopening ceremony in Paris on Saturday.

title: Trump says US should stay out of Syrian conflict: 'Not our fight'
shortDescription: Rebel forces are waging a new offensive against Syrian President Bashar al-Assad in the country's long running civil war.

title: Trump's triumphant red carpet return to meet French President Macron
shortDescription: Donald Trump gets the red carpet treatment from French President Emmanuel Macron in Paris ahead of Notre Dame Cathedral ceremony.
